poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Device: it looked like Hans Holbein the Younger, Stark as science; date - coming on 500 years ago. The central shield was empty; angels' faces Vied with hidden forces for control. Emblems that draped the horrid vacuum (Some cover-up on innocence made to pay) Were probably not symbolic, but mnemonic: Magic memory theatre; forgotten play.
